name: Elegy Priest
desc: "Flower of Annihilation" appears in the Action Order: Records "Blazar" obtained by allies. When it takes action, deals Fire DMG equal to 5000% of the recorded value plus 3000% base DMG to all enemy targets, then clears the record. Increases its SPD by 1% for each "Obsession" stack that allies possess. When any ally target enters battle or is downed, or when any memosprite is summoned or disappears, Charges "Blazar" equal to 25% of Max HP for all ally targets.
